  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes this element with default values and prepares it for later use.

    • setCenterCard

      public void setCenterCard(CardController cardController, Set<Position> legalPositions, Set<Position> illegalPositions)
      Sets the center card of this play area. This method should only be used on a freshly created element, when the grid is still empty, and ONLY ONCE.
      Parameters:
      cardController - The controller for the center card.
      legalPositions - The set of positions where a card can be placed.
      illegalPositions - The set of positions where a card cannot be placed.

    • putCard

      public void putCard(CardController cardController, Position position, Set<Position> addedLegalPositions, Set<Position> removedLegalPositions)
      Puts the given card in the given position.
      Parameters:
      cardController - The controller for the new card.
      position - The position where the new card should be placed.
      addedLegalPositions - The set of new positions where a card can be placed.
      removedLegalPositions - The set of positions where a card can no longer be placed.

    • expandUp

      private void expandUp()
      Expands the grid upwards by one tile.

      public javafx.scene.Parent getRoot()
      Returns:

    • addNewFiller

      private javafx.scene.layout.Pane addNewFiller(Position position)
      Creates a new grid filler, without adding it to the grid. Grid fillers are used as placeholders to detect when a card is dropped on them, and they are placed only where new cards can be placed on the grid.
      Parameters:
      position - The position where the new grid filler will be placed.
      Returns:
      The newly created grid filler's root pane.

    • removeFiller

      private void removeFiller(Position fillerPosition)
      Removes the grid filler at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      fillerPosition - The position of the filler to remove.

    • putFillersInGrid

      public void putFillersInGrid(Set<Position> positions)
      Creates and adds multiple new grid fillers to the grid.
      Parameters:
      positions - The positions where new grid fillers should be placed.
      See Also:
      • putFillerInGrid(it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.util.Position)

    • putFillerInGrid

      private void putFillerInGrid(Position position)
      Creates a new grid filler and puts it in the grid.
      Parameters:
      position - The position where the new filler should be placed.

    • setOwnerUsername

      public void setOwnerUsername(String username)
      Sets the username of the owner of this play area grid.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the owner of this play area grid.

    • getOwnerUsername

      public String getOwnerUsername()
      Returns:
